title: Free standing objects placed between the height of 0
clause_text: Free standing objects placed between the height of 0.58 m and 2.0 m from the floor level shall have an overhang of not more than 0.3 m as illustrated in Sketch No 6 in Annexure 23.

source_pdf.text_snippet: Free standing objects placed between the height of 0.58 m and 2.0 m from the floor level shall have an overhang of not more than 0.3 m as illustrated in Sketch No 6 in Annexure 23.
